name: Hero Odyssey (itch)
description:
Presentation

Hero Odyssey is Metroidvania inspired by great titles of the same genre like Hollow Knight & Ori, with a frantic and fast paced gameplay focused on combat.

Explore the Realm of Darkness, fight against different creatures and monsters, gain new abilities and learn new sword techniques.

The game is still in development, a lot of work has been done, and there is still a lot to be done, but that does not stop me from sharing the game with everyone after more than 2 years of work.

Please, if you can leave a comment about the game experience, positive or negative, it would help me. Thanks in advance.

Content

The demo contains a part of the very first zone to explore “The Green Forest”, with different creatures to fight against and a Mini-Boss. This will guarantee you at least 1 hour of gameplay. Hope you will enjoy the adventure!

Future Updates

There will be great changes in the game, especially concerning the environmental art, I 'm already in contact with some great Freelancers to make the best version of the game as fast as possible, but before I begin this step, it would be very helpful to have some first reviews from you, players.

Follow the work

Follow me on Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/heroodyssey

 

Controls Controller (X-Input)

Attack : X

Jump : A

Heal : B

Map : Y

Inventory : RB

Pause : Start

Keyboard

Move : Directional Keys

Sword Attack : S

Jump : Space

Heal : H

Inventory : I

Map : M

Pause : Escape
